verses.name: Mark 15:6
verses.text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner, whomsoever they desired.

verses.name: Mark 15:7
verses.text: And there was one named Barabbas, which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him, who had committed murder in the insurrection.

verses.name: Mark 15:8
verses.text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them.

verses.name: Mark 15:9
verses.text: But Pilate answered them, saying, Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews?

verses.name: Mark 15:10
verses.text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy.

verses.name: Mark 15:11
verses.text: But the chief priests moved the people, that he should rather release Barabbas unto them.
